channel.title: Young people creating belonging
channel.description: creative sensory methods to explore how young people who are looked after feel that they belong

item.title: Sight and Sound Project
item.dc:creator: Paul Hart
item.description: In this project  we used creative sensory methods to explore how young people who are looked after feel they ‘belong’. Follow the navigation at the top to find out about the project, its findings and recommendations. You will also find samples of the materials the young people created, including music, videos, drawings and photos. A hard … Continue reading Sight and Sound Project
item.content:encoded:
In this project  we used creative sensory methods to explore how young people who are looked after feel they ‘belong’.

Follow the navigation at the top to find out about the project, its findings and recommendations. You will also find samples of the materials the young people created, including music, videos, drawings and photos.

A hard copy (PDF) of the report is available.

Please tell us what you think.
